name: Explosive Lobber
entries: Explosive 5. Upon a hit, everything within a radius determined by its explosive value of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC equal to 8 + the firearm's tier x2) or take an additional damage equal to the damage roll. Explosive weapons have their misfire score increased by 1.
Barrel 1. A barrel is a chamber that holds a number of rounds. You can spend a Bonus Action to reload a single round in your barrel.
